sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含有"小心的，谨慎的"之意。
means: careful ： 侧重做事谨慎、留心，特别注意一些细节地方。
cautious ： 着重考虑事情的后果，谨慎留意，防止出差错。
attentive ： 指认真地注意地倾听别人的意见，留心别人的需要等。
prudent ： 指遇事审慎，思考计划周密，不贸然行事。

sentence.Network_en: You have to be careful what you say on telly.
sentence.Network_cn: 在电视上说话时你必须很谨慎。

sentence.Network_en: Interior decoration by careful coordination seems to have had its day.
sentence.Network_cn: 精心搭配的室内装饰似乎已不再受欢迎了。

sentence.Network_en: One of the keys to successful business is careful planning.
sentence.Network_cn: 打造成功企业的关键之一就是要精心策划。

encyclopedia.content: 浙江康芙娅妇幼用品有限公司成立1996年是温州市知名商标，是温州市专利示范企业，“消费者满意产品”，浙江省“质量信得过产品”。Careful于2009年7月吸收合并乾盛康药业有限公司。并改名为“中国乾盛康集团”

entry.def: If you are careful, you give serious attention to what you are doing, in order to avoid harm, damage, or mistakes. If you are careful to do something, you make sure that you do it.

example.ex: Be very careful with this stuff, it can be dangerous if it isn't handled properly...
example.tran: 这东西一定要小心,稍不注意的话就会有危险。

entry.def: Careful work, thought, or examination is thorough and shows a concern for details.

example.ex: He has decided to prosecute her after careful consideration of all the relevant facts...
example.tran: 在认真考虑了所有相关事实后,他决定起诉她。

example.ex: What we now know about the disease was learned by careful study of diseased organs.
example.tran: 我们目前对该疾病的认识是通过对病变器官的仔细研究得来的。

entry.def: If you tell someone to be careful about doing something, you think that what they intend to do is probably wrong, and that they should think seriously before they do it.

example.ex: I think you should be careful about talking of the rebels as heroes...
example.tran: 我觉得你说话应该小心,不能把反叛分子当英雄。

example.ex: It is important, I think, for everyone to be careful about claiming victory.
example.tran: 我想,每个人宣布胜利时都应该慎重。

entry.def: If you are careful with something such as money or resources, you use or spend only what is necessary.

example.ex: You will have to make a special effort to train your child to be careful with her pocket-money...
example.tran: 你得格外注意培养孩子的节俭意识，零花钱要省着花。

example.ex: It would force industries to be more careful with natural resources.
example.tran: 这将迫使企业更加节约资源。

entry.tran: 越谨慎越好;再小心也不为过
entry.def: You can say 'You can't be too careful' as a way of advising someone to be careful, even when this seems unnecessary.

example.ex: You can't be too careful when a young child is near water.
example.tran: 孩子在水边时,还是越小心越好。

means.word_mean: 1. exercising caution or showing care or attention;

sentences.sentence: "they were careful when crossing the busy street"
"be careful to keep her shoes clean"
"Thou art careful and troubled about many things"-Luke 10.41

means.word_mean: 5. mindful of the future in spending money;

stems_affixes.word_buile: care关心,抚爱+ful有……的→adj.小心的,仔细的
care关心,抚爱→n.注意, 照料, v.关心, 顾虑, 照顾, 喜爱 v.在意

Sentence.sentence: In the next couple of years the businesses that thrive will be those that are tight with costs, careful of debt, cautious with cash flow and extremely attentive to what customers want.
Children should be taught to be more careful.
A better way to solve this problem might be for all of us to be more careful with our things.
Something else they need to be careful about is medicines.

My idea would be to combine that with careful oversight, a strong organizational culture, and make sure the goals that you use are going to be constructive and not significantly harm the organization," Schweitzer says.
But Delia was careful not to adopt the defensive tone.

sentences.en: Be careful not to get eaten up with pride.
sentences.cn: 注意, 不要骄傲自满。

jushi.english: He took careful aim and fired at the rabbit.
jushi.chinese: 他仔细瞄准,然后向兔子开枪射击。

jushi.english: This problem calls for careful thinking.
jushi.chinese: 这个问题需要仔细考虑考虑。

jushi.english: Without careful investigation you're liable to come to wrong conclusions.
jushi.chinese: 不仔细调查研究,你就会得出错误结论。
